content.rendered:
Consolidate Your Debt And Take The Stress Out Of Repayments.

Mariner Loan Solution Has Helped Thousands Of South African's To Reduce Their Installments And To Manage Their Debt Better. 

If keeping up with payments on credit cards, store accounts, and personal loans is all a bit too much, there is a solution: debt consolidation. With a consolidation loan, all your debt is combined into a single loan, and your old credit accounts are closed. This makes for easier repayments and a lot less stress if you’ve always struggled to keep track of what payments are going off when.
 
 

20+

Years Experiance



PROCESSES   INVOLVED

Service benefits

  • A single service fee and credit protection plan.
  • A single fixed monthly payment.
  • Lower monthly payments on your qualifying credit; consolidating debt frees up cash.
  • Our experienced debt consolidation team will handle all the admin of settling your credit commitments.
  • You could qualify for further cash in your bank account.
  • A fixed loan term that avoids the cycle of revolving credit.
